column1: Uchi////** SERVICE: From start to finish
column2: Uchi's employees were a total delight. The hostesses greeted us immediately with dashing smiles
column3: waiters patiently and happily answered our questions
column4: and the bartenders were friendly and awesome dudes. What really struck me was how knowledgeable everyone was about Uchi's menu - while we were waiting and having a few pre-dinner drinks at the bar
column5: even the bartenders were able to explain
column7: and "wow" us with their food expertise. Everyone was SUPER nice - I really felt like I was at home
column8: chatting with friends over a glass of wine. I can honestly say
column9: my beau and I had THE most wonderful time!
